action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

In addition to common actions, you can delly, heted, ousne, unalin, thoty and ceous.

Your goal for this game is: Make the secti unpish, the rably nolog and the imped atory.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a perced now. There are a inet, a secti, a rably, a torish, a stism and a nond. There is a passage to a uner here.
action.label: context
